description: Champion model selection weights - defines criteria importance

balanced.description: Balanced profile - equal focus on performance and risk

quality.description: Quality profile - prioritizes model accuracy and consistency

notes: All weights within a profile must sum to 1.0
Metrics are normalized to 0-1 scale before weighting
max_drawdown is negative (closer to 0 is better)
Use conservative profile for risk-averse strategies
Use aggressive profile for growth-focused strategies
Use quality profile when model reliability is critical
